creditline: Gift of Harriet and Walter Pratt
description: abstract image; brown vertical form at right with a mottled grey square and red-orange spot in LRC; orange form with curving lines at lower enter and vertical line and square on top of form; grey form with a triangle and half-circle on top in ULQ; bar of various colors (red-orange, brown, dark blue, green) beneath grey form in ULQ; brown Orval at top left of center; long orange diagonal from LRC to URC; inscription in URC; ground is cream, heavy coated cloth--may be mounted?; received in gilt frame
title: Untitled (12 Januar 60)
